verses.verse: To the <S%H5329>chief<s%> <S%H5329>Musician,<s%> A <S%H4210>Psalm<s%> for the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7141>Korah.<s%> O <S%H8628>clap<s%> your <S%H3709>hands,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> you <S%H5971>people;<s%> <S%H7321>shout<s%> to <S%H430>God<s%> with the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of <S%H7440>triumph.<s%>
For the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5945>most<s%> <S%H5945>high<s%> is <S%H3372>terrible;<s%> he is a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4428>King<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>earth.<s%>
He shall <S%H1696>subdue<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> us, and the <S%H3816>nations<s%> <S%H8478>under<s%> our <S%H7272>feet.<s%>
He shall <S%H977>choose<s%> our <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> for us, the <S%H1347>excellency<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> he <S%H157>loved.<s%> <S%H5542>Selah.<s%>
<S%H430>God<s%> is <S%H5927>gone<s%> up with a <S%H8643>shout,<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> with the <S%H6963>sound<s%> of a <S%H7782>trumpet.<s%>
<S%H2167>Sing<s%> praises to <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H2167>sing<s%> praises: <S%H2167>sing<s%> praises to our <S%H4428>King,<s%> <S%H2167>sing<s%> praises.
For <S%H430>God<s%> is the <S%H4428>King<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>earth:<s%> <S%H2167>sing<s%> you praises with <S%H7919>understanding.<s%>

The <S%H5081>princes<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> are <S%H622>gathered<s%> <S%H3162>together,<s%> even the <S%H5971>people<s%> of the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H85>Abraham:<s%> for the <S%H4043>shields<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> belong to <S%H430>God:<s%> he is <S%H3966>greatly<s%> <S%H5927>exalted.<s%>
